backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profiles with picture/bio, team management with video uploads (including uploader tracking), mail/inbox system, access control via mixins, and migration support for data schema evolution.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old user profiles (name only) to new profiles (name, profilePicture, aboutMe) and old team videos (blob only) to new videos (videoId, blob, uploader).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five implemented features: profile page with picture/bio, profile picture uploader, Twitter-style video cards, video delete functionality, and profile navigation link.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including routing, React Query hooks, authentication, responsive layout components, team management pages, and mobile-optimized UI with touch-friendly interactions.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system, dark mode support, tournament-themed purple/blue palette, touch-action optimization, and accessibility features like reduced motion.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport configuration for mobile responsiveness, Open Graph and Twitter Card metadata for social sharing, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component with hash-based routing for seven pages (home, teams, profile, inbox, etc.), authentication state management, profile setup modal for new users, and theme provider integration.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Reusable authentication button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states, query cache clearing on logout, and error recovery for duplicate authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name on first login, using a form with validation and loading states to save the profile via useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation.
frontend/src/components/files/PdfList.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating PDF list functionality has been replaced with team footage gallery.
frontend/src/components/files/PdfUploade: Empty placeholder file indicating PDF upload functionality has been replaced with team footage uploads.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Main application header with navigation links (Home, Teams, Create Team, My Teams, Inbox, Profile), mobile menu toggle, login button, and unread inbox badge counter.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageShell: Reusable page layout wrapper component that provides consistent max-width container, optional title and description header, and renders children content.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: File input component for uploading profile pictures with preview, validation (PNG/JPG/WebP, max 2MB), and conversion to ExternalBlob format for backend storage.
frontend/src/components/teams/JoinReques: Button component that handles team join requests with membership status checks, preventing users from joining multiple teams and showing appropriate states (loading, already on team, request sent).
frontend/src/components/teams/TeamFootag: Displays a grid of team video footage with delete functionality for team leaders/members, showing video player, uploader avatar, team icon, and empty state when no videos exist.
Video file upload component with progress tracking, validation (video formats, max 100MB), and conversion to ExternalBlob for uploading team footage to backend.
frontend/src/components/teams/TeamIconUp: React component for uploading and previewing team icons with file validation (PNG/JPG/WebP, max 2MB), preview display, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Custom React hooks for fetching the current user's profile and role using React Query and the actor instance.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, team operations (create, join, approve requests, leave), and team data fetching with toast notifications for success/error states.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors, base styles for smooth scrolling and touch interactions, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CreateTeamPage.tsx: Page component for creating a new team with name input and optional icon upload, including validation to prevent users from creating multiple teams and navigation after successful creation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature cards, and call-to-action buttons for browsing teams and creating teams. Displays Beyblade X branding with responsive layout and conditional rendering based on authentication status.
frontend/src/pages/InboxPage.tsx: Inbox page for viewing and managing mail messages, including join requests with approve/deny actions. Implements mail selection, mark-as-read, and delete functionality with loading and authentication guards.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderDashboardPage.t: Dashboard for team leaders to view and manage their teams and pending join requests. Shows overview of owned teams with member counts and request notifications.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page with view/edit modes for name, about me, and profile picture. Includes profile picture uploader with progress tracking and form validation.
frontend/src/pages/TeamDetailPage.tsx: Detailed team view page showing team info, members, icon, and footage gallery. Provides leader actions (disband, remove members, upload icon/footage) and member actions (leave, join request).
frontend/src/pages/TeamListPage.tsx: Grid view of all teams with team icons, member counts, and navigation to detail pages. Includes loading states and empty state with create team prompt.
frontend/src/utils/imageDataUrl.ts: Utility functions to convert image bytes and content type to data URLs, either as object URLs or base64-encoded data URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting and managing URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH, container settings, border radius variables, font families, and animation keyframes for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document for a social video sharing app, listing existing features (profile pages, profile picture uploads, Twitter-style video cards, video deletion) and pending feature requests.
